title.native: 下ネタという概念が存在しない退屈な世界
title.romaji: Shimoneta to Iu Gainen ga Sonzai Shinai Taikutsu na Sekai
title.english: SHIMONETA: A Boring World Where the Concept of Dirty Jokes Doesn’t Exist

description:
The novel's story is set 16 years after the "Law for Public Order and Morals in Healthy Child-Raising" banned coarse language in the country. Tanukichi Okuma enrolls in the country's leading elite public morals school and is soon invited into the Anti-Societal Organization (SOX) by its founder, Ayame Kajou. As a member blackmailed into joining by Ayame, Tanukichi ends up taking part in obscene acts of terrorism against the talented student council president Anna (for whom Tanukichi has a crush).

(Source: Anime News Network)

tags.name: Satire
tags.description: Prominently features the use of comedy or ridicule to expose and criticise social phenomena.

tags.name: Politics
tags.description: Centers around politics, politicians, or government activities.

tags.name: Hypersexuality
tags.description: Portrays a character with a hypersexuality disorder, compulsive sexual behavior, or sex addiction.

tags.name: School
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a primary or secondary educational institution.

tags.name: Dystopian
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a society characterized by poverty, squalor or oppression.

tags.name: Terrorism
tags.description: Centers around the activities of a terrorist or terrorist organization.

tags.name: Parody
tags.description: Features deliberate exaggeration of popular tropes or a particular genre to comedic effect.

tags.name: Crime
tags.description: Centers around unlawful activities punishable by the state or other authority.

tags.name: LGBTQ+ Themes
tags.description: Prominently features characters or themes associated with the LGBTQ+ community, such as sexuality or gender identity.

tags.name: Nudity
tags.description: Features a character wearing no clothing or exposing intimate body parts.

tags.name: Yandere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is obsessively in love with another, to the point of acting deranged or violent.

tags.name: Educational
tags.description: Primary aim is to educate the audience.

tags.name: Femdom
tags.description: Female Dominance. Features sexual acts with a woman in a dominant position.

tags.name: Crossdressing
tags.description: Prominently features a character dressing up as the opposite sex.

tags.name: Kuudere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who generally retains a cold, blunt and cynical exterior, but once one gets to know them, they have a very warm and loving interior.

tags.name: Slapstick
tags.description: Prominently features comedy based on deliberately clumsy actions or embarrassing events.

An art director who worked for Kobayashi Productions, but left together with [Hiromasa Ogura](https://anilist.co/staff/105312/) and Hiroshi Oono to establish Studio Fuga in March 3, 1983. He stayed until 1997, when he left to establish Moonflower, where he also acts as representative director.
